name: Addicted Sticky Rock Jumper
description:
How often can you get the stickman through the opened circles?

Tap to jump and don't hit the wall of the circle. It might seem stupid simple to you, but it might be deadly to your addicted to jump character.

Don't get too close to the wall, or you might hit rock bottom and break your stick figure.

Tap the screen to get the sticky in and out of the circles as many times as humanly possible.

Jumping at a steady pace will take you far!

Share your score with friends, and don't forget: rating this app helps a great deal!

NOTE: This game can get addictive! Proceed with caution!

Thank you for playing!
